interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Cleansing Brush, Wireless Charging Base Soft Brush Set with 3 Brush Heads for Face Spa, Exfoliating, Massaging and Deep Cleansing Review Date: 2022/02/20 Store: Syllable Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Syllable', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 6.89 x 3.31 inches; 1.52 Pounds'} Review Text: 3/5 Rating

I've read a lot of reviews concerning this facial cleansing brush. I think it's pretty good. It's not the best I've used but it's cool and it does it's job. I'm praying that it doesn't break down on me. Lol. So far so good.

Pros
Easy to use
Multiple settings
Multiple heads

Cons
Big form factor Review Title: So far so good with me. This brush works.. Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Isshah Stainless Steel Metal Tongue Scraper Cleaner - Get Rid of Bad Breath and Bacteria - Pack of 4 - Eco Friendly Packaging Isshah {'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 3.74 x 0.51 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '778299097277'} I used one of the tongue scrapers this morning and let me say.. It's life changing. It felt like I just learned how to brush my teeth.

I've never used a tongue scraper before but it was recommended by my Dentist maybe a year ago. I thought I was good by just brushing it with my Electric Toothbrush as I've always done it. Using it this morning!!! It was like an epiphany. I can see how this helps exponentially with your oral hygiene. I honestly felt like a fool after seeing the results and realize this was what I was missing out on for many years.

The items come in a box, you take one out, sterilize it and all you do is place over your tongue, apply pressure and pull down. You will be surprised at what you see removed from the back of your tongue to the front. I was taken back.

I honestly don't know how I could have lived this long without using one of these. I think I will buy one for all of my family. I feel like I done dental hygiene wrong all my life Bloomy Essentials Organic Lemon Essential Oil 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - Great for Household Cleaner & Laundry - 100% Pure Bloomy Essentials {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemon', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 2.52 x 1.06 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084635', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'} I have a diffuser that I use every single day. I m always looking for different oils and scents to use to liven up my place. I saw this and figured why not, give it a try..

I'm glad I did. This is literally the MOST natural lemon smelling scent I have ever used. When using in a diffuser you won't need much, just a few drops. If you buy this you won't regret it. I've had it for over a week and I'm pretty pleased with it. A little does go a long way.

Pros

Smells very good
No weird after smell

Cons

Not really much of it..
Bottle is pretty small. I'm impressed by this Essential Lemon Oil Manicure Set, 14pcs Pedicure Kit, Nail Clippers, Professional Grooming Kit with Black Luxurious Leather Travel Case for Men Women EASTBUDDY {'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 3.4 x 1.2 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} My stepmother gave me a personal grooming kit almost 20 years ago. It did not have all the things this kit had, but nevertheless I still have and treasure that kit as my Stepmom has since passed away. It's something I keep and remember her by.

This kit is like the 3.0 version of what she gave me. It even has some items I'm not sure of the use.

As soon as I opened it, it became useful. Oftentimes I'm sitting at my desk for super long periods of the day and oftentimes I may start biting my nails or even cleaning my ears as I'm looking at my computer screens. This kit allows me to clip my nails without having to run to the bathroom and grab my mother's kit. The tools in this kit allows it to be a one stop shop so that means it has a permanent place near my office desk. You can't go wrong getting this.

Pros
Fairly Compact
Portable
Many tools
Stainless steel
It has the ear scraper / cleaner.. That makes it a winner right there.

Cons
Not really any.. I just wish I knew what all the tools were used for. I guess I have to do some researching. Good Portable ALL in ONE nail clipper / grooming kit 24bio Hair Growth Supplement/ Get Results Or Money Back Guarantee/ Hair Care Supplement For Men And Women/ May Stimulate Hair Growth & Thicken Hair/ Full of Biotin, Amla Extract, M.S.M & More 24bio {'Brand': '24bio', 'Item Form': 'Capsules', 'Material Type Free': 'Gluten Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.17 x 2.13 x 1.89 inches; 2.65 Ounces', 'Department': 'Unisex-adult', 'UPC': '869539000475', 'Manufacturer': 'NutraScience'} I had high hopes when I ordered these pills. Since this quarantine I've decided to let my hair grow and thanks to the wonders of getting older I've noticed I have some thinning at the top of my head (around the crown).

When these pills arrived first thing I noticed was the smell. They smell horrible - like old cabbage. But I learned to never judge a book by it's cover. I decided to take anyway.

I've been taking for a little over 2 weeks as my hair has grown, but I don't know if it's just natural growth. My hair has filled in somewhat in the thinning areas but I think this is what it would have done anyway. I will continue to take and update my review if my beard / head hair fills in.

Pros
Good quantity

Cons
Not sure if it works
Smells horrible - like old cabbage Had high hopes, not sure if it really works. Smells like old cabbage Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} Growing up I remember seeing my Dad's feet. It was very hard and crusty at the bottom because he would stand on his feet all night while he worked. My Dad still is a man's man.. He's relaxed in his old age but that's the site I have of him.

When he took his socks off, you could see the hardened skin and callouses.. This would have worked WONDERS for him. Ever since I've always been mindful to take care of my feet. I clip my nails regularly, I do not wear super tight shoes or socks where air can't get through to my feet. This callous remover kit will add another step in foot care.

It arrived and I immediately opened it.. I followed the direction and now my feet feel even softer than before. I applied a lotion to them after I finished and washed them. I can actually feel every step. Lol.

If you have second guesses about this, don't. It works.

Pros
It Works
Simple to use
Rechargeable

Cons
None I was very excited to get this. Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer leuxe {'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'} I recently ordered a rotating face brush last month and it was BAD. IT was battery operated, it didn't have a stand and it didn't have the power I needed.

THIS on the other hand is the complete opposite. This is a thorough rotating face brush that is rechargeable and has different modes. It also supports USB charging. Its a very thorough deep cleanser that you can use and carry with you that's portable.

Pros
It actually works
It's rechargeable
3 different modes

Cons
None One of the BEST exfoliating and cleansing brushes out there Easydew Daily Double Hydra Cream 2.02 fl oz - Moisturizing Cream with EGF & Serine of NMFHydrating, Soothing, Anti-Aging EGF, Serine - N.M.F(Natural Moisturizing Factors) for Oily, Sensitive, Acne-Prone, Dry Skin Types EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '5.2911 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Oily,Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 1.69 x 1.46 inches; 3 Ounces'} 5/5 Rating

First impressions - Looks unassuming until you screw the top off then you realize this is quality packaging. I've been using this for the past week and I'll use on my face as soon as I finish brushing my teeth and deep cleansing my face. I apply this moisturizer and I can immediately tell the difference. As an African American male I have oily / dry skin at times. I prefer for my face to be moisturized as it prevents wrinkles for me. This product goes on easy and smooth and doesn't leave oily residue on hands or face.

Pros
Nice functioning container
Moisturizer works immediately after applying
Long lasting
Doesn't leave oily residue

Cons
None.. Wish I had more. Right out the shower this stuff works sdoot Misting Spray Bottle, 2 Pack 200ml Plasitc Plant Spray Bottle Refillable Clear Mist Bottle Sprayer for Hair, Cleaning sdoot {'Brand': 'sdoot', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '200 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Lightweight, Mist Spray'} 3/5 Ratings

First impression - I won't lie, they arrived and looked a little on the cheap side. I got these for two reasons. My spray bottle for my fabric freshener broke and this spray bottle / spray nozzle fits the exact size of it. The second reason was to be able to spritz / water my plants.

They are relatively inexpensive and feel as such. I don't like that there's no way to lock the nozzle with the exception of applying the blue "lock" accessory. But overall, it does exactly what it states

Pros
Works well
Can use the nozzle on other containers

Cons
Feel cheap
Uses accessory to "lock" nozzle. Inexpensive but works well KLAVUU Pure Pearlsation pH Balancing Quick Cleansing Pad 100ea - Powerful Makeup Mild Exfoliating Cleansing Pad without Skin Irritation, Intense Moisturizing KLAVUU {'Brand': 'KLAVUU', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '100.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.74 x 3.74 x 4.33 inches; 1.21 Pounds'} 5/5 Ratings

These cleansing pads are the TRUTH. They are very sizey and do a great job of deep cleansing your skin. They work on gentle and normal skin as well. These are not only for removing make up these are a good end of the day cleanser to use to open your pores and give your skin a refreshed feeling.

Pros
Nice Sized pads
Can be used for morning or evenings
Cleans more than just make up

Cons
None really Nice big cleansing pads that really do work.
